Summary: Define locator strategy for airline UI automation
description:
Define stable locator rules for airline UI elements to reduce flaky tests.
Acceptance Criteria
Preferred locator hierarchy defined
At least 5 elements updated
Document shared with team
Sample Data
Page
Element
Locator
Search
From City
aria-label
Payment
Pay Button
data-testid

Summary: Implement API health check tests for airline core services
description:
Add basic API health checks to validate availability of airline backend services.
Acceptance Criteria
Health checks implemented for at least 3 services
Response code validation added
Execution integrated with CI pipeline
Sample Data
Service
Endpoint
Expected
Booking
/health
200
Payment
/health
200
Check-in
/health
200

Summary: Define test data sets for airline booking scenarios
description:
Create reusable test data for common airline booking scenarios.
Acceptance Criteria
At least 3 booking scenarios defined
Data stored in JSON or CSV
Covers positive and negative cases
Sample Data
```
{
  "tripType": "RoundTrip",
  "passengerType": "Adult",
  "paymentMethod": "CreditCard",
  "fareClass": "Economy"
}
```

Summary: Document airline regulatory validations required for testing
description:
Identify regulatory validations applicable to airline digital systems that must be tested.
Acceptance Criteria
Minimum 5 regulatory checks listed
Each check mapped to affected system
Validation method identified (UI/API/Log)
Sample Data
Regulation
System
Validation
Passenger Data Privacy
PSS
API
Refund Rules
Booking
UI
Audit Logging
Core Services
Logs

Summary: Map airline journeys to UI and API automation coverage
description:
Map identified airline journeys to appropriate automation layers (UI vs API).
Acceptance Criteria
Each journey mapped to at least one automation layer
Justification documented
Gaps identified

API

Summary: Identify top 5 critical airline user journeys for automation
description:
Analyze airline business flows and identify the most critical passenger and operational journeys that require automated coverage.
Acceptance Criteria:
List at least 5 airline user journeys
Each journey mapped to business risk (High/Medium/Low)
Reviewed with Product or Domain SME
Sample Data
Journey
Risk
Flight Search → Booking
High
Web Check-in
High
Seat Selection
Medium
Cancellation & Refund
High
Flight Status Tracking
Medium
